name: Flour
description: Finely ground grains used in baking.

name: Raw Meat
description: Fresh meat obtained from hunted animals.

name: Fresh Eggs
description: A carton of fresh eggs collected from local fowl. Versatile for baking and cooking.

name: Aromatic Herbs
description: A bundle of fragrant herbs picked from the wild, adding flavor to soups, stews, and other dishes.

name: Wild Berries
description: A handful of freshly picked wild berries, perfect for desserts, jams, or a refreshing snack.

name: Fresh Milk
description: Milk obtained from local livestock, used in a variety of recipes including cheeses and puddings.

name: Honey
description: A jar of golden honey collected from beehives, prized as a natural sweetener in culinary creations.

name: Raw Fish
description: Fresh fish caught from nearby waters, offering a delicate flavor ideal for various recipes.

name: Root Vegetables
description: A mix of hearty root vegetables that can be roasted, boiled, or mashed to create nourishing meals.
